title: American Comic Strips
systemPrompt: Generate a script for a presentation of the given topic. Another AI will generate comic strips for each beat based on the text description of that beat. Movie prompts must be written in English. Mention the reference in one of beats, if it exists. Use the JSON below as a template.

imageParams.style: <style>Photo realistic, cinematic style. The presenter is a young woman with a dark short hair.</style>
